description.english: Request Zussman to toss you First Aid Kits 30 times.
description.german: Bitten Sie Zussman 30-mal, Ihnen einen Verbandkasten zuzuwerfen.
description.french: Demandez à Zussman de vous lancer des trousses de secours 30 fois.
description.italian: Chiedi 30 volte a Zussman di lanciarti kit medici.
description.spanish: Pide a Zussman que te lance botiquines 30 veces.
description.schinese: 总计30次从祖斯曼手中接过急救包。
description.tchinese: 要求扎斯曼給你急救包30次。
description.japanese: ザスマンに救急キットを30回要請する
description.arabic: Request Zussman to toss you First Aid Kits 30 times.
description.brazilian: Peça para Zussman jogar kits de primeiros socorros para você 30 vezes.

description.english: Request Pierson to spot enemies 25 times.
description.german: Bitten Sie Pierson 25-mal, nach Feinden Ausschau zu halten.
description.french: Demandez à Pierson de détecter des ennemis 25 fois.
description.italian: Chiedi 25 volte a Pierson di individuare i nemici.
description.spanish: Pide a Pierson que detecte enemigos 25 veces.
description.schinese: 总计25次请求皮尔森侦察敌情。
description.tchinese: 要求皮爾遜追蹤敵人25次。
description.russian: 25 раз запросить обнаружение противников у Пирсона.
description.japanese: ピアソンに敵の発見を25回要請する
description.polish: 25 razy poproś Piersona o wypatrywanie wroga.
description.arabic: Request Pierson to spot enemies 25 times.
description.brazilian: Peça a Pierson para detectar inimigos 25 vezes.

description.english: Request Turner to toss you ammo 20 times.
description.german: Bitten Sie Turner 20-mal, Ihnen Munition zuzuwerfen.
description.french: Demandez à Turner de vous lancer des munitions 20 fois.
description.italian: Chiedi 20 volte a Turner di lanciarti delle munizioni.
description.spanish: Pide a Turner que te lance munición 20 veces.
description.schinese: 总计20次从特纳手中接过弹药。
description.tchinese: 要求透納給你彈藥20次。
description.japanese: ターナーに弾薬を20回要請する
description.arabic: Request Turner to toss you ammo 20 times.
description.brazilian: Peça para Turner jogar munição para você 20 vezes.

displayName.japanese: スクール・オブ・ハードノック

description.english: Request Stiles to toss you grenades 15 times
description.german: Bitten Sie Stiles 15-mal, Ihnen Granaten zuzuwerfen
description.french: Demandez à Turner de vous lancer des grenades 15 fois.
description.italian: Chiedi 15 volte a Stiles di lanciarti delle granate.
description.spanish: Pide a Stiles que te lance granadas 15 veces.
description.schinese: 总计15次从斯泰尔斯手中接过手雷
description.tchinese: 要求史泰爾斯給你手榴彈15次
description.japanese: スタイルズにグレネードを15回要請する
description.arabic: Request Stiles to toss you grenades 15 times
description.brazilian: Peça para Stiles jogar granadas para você 15 vezes.

displayName.japanese: ペンダントなんて要るか？

description.english: Request Aiello to toss you signal smoke and call in mortar strikes 10 times
description.german: Bitten Sie Aiello 10-mal, ihnen Signalrauch zuzuwerfen, und fordern Sie so einen Mörserangriff an
description.french: Demandez à Aiello de vous lancer des balises fumigènes et appelez des frappes de mortier 10 fois.
description.italian: Chiedi 10 volte ad Aiello di lanciarti fumogeni di segnalazione e richiedere attacchi con mortaio.
description.koreana: 아엘로에게 연막탄을 받아 박격포 지원을 10번 요청하십시오.
description.spanish: Pide a Aiello que te lance señales de humo y solicita ataques de mortero 10 veces.
description.schinese: 总计10次从阿耶洛手中接过信号烟雾弹呼叫迫击炮打击
description.tchinese: 要求艾羅給你信號煙霧彈並呼叫迫擊砲攻擊10次
description.russian: 10 раз попросить у Айелло дымовую шашку и вызвать минометный удар
description.japanese: アイエロに信号煙の要請をして迫撃砲攻撃を10回行わせる
description.polish: 10 razy poproś Aiello o granaty sygnalizacyjne i wezwij ostrzał moździerzowy
description.arabic: Request Aiello to toss you signal smoke and call in mortar strikes 10 times
description.brazilian: Peça para Aiello jogar sinal de fumaça para você e solicitar ataques morteiros 10 vezes.

description.english: Save 5 allies by throwing away a live enemy grenade.
description.german: Retten Sie 5 Verbündete, indem Sie eine scharfe feindliche Granate wegwerfen.
description.french: Sauver 5 alliés en éloignant une grenade ennemie dégoupillée.
description.italian: Salva 5 alleati lanciando via una granata nemica attiva.
description.koreana: 안전핀 뽑힌 적의 수류탄을 되던져 아군 5명을 구합니다.
description.spanish: Salva a 5 aliados lanzando lejos una granada enemiga activada.
description.schinese: 总计5次扔开即将爆炸的敌方手榴弹救下队友。
description.tchinese: 丟開即將引爆的榴彈，拯救5位盟友。
description.russian: Спасти 5 союзников, отбросив взведенные вражеские гранаты.
description.japanese: ピンの抜かれた敵のグレネードを投げ返して味方を5人助ける
description.arabic: Save 5 allies by throwing away a live enemy grenade.
description.brazilian: Salve 5 aliados jogando uma granada inimiga.

description.english: Disable 50 enemies using smoke grenades.
description.german: Machen Sie 50 Feinde mit Rauchgranaten kampfunfähig.
description.french: Neutralisez 50 ennemis avec des grenades fumigènes.
description.italian: Metti fuori combattimento 50 nemici usando granate fumogene.
description.spanish: Inutiliza a 50 enemigos usando granadas de humo.
description.schinese: 使用烟雾弹遮挡总计50个敌人的视线。
description.tchinese: 用煙霧彈使50個敵人失去行動能力。
description.russian: Вывести из строя 50 противников с помощью дымовых гранат.
description.japanese: スモークグレネードで敵を50回無力化する
description.arabic: Disable 50 enemies using smoke grenades.
description.brazilian: Desabilite 50 inimigos usando granadas de fumaça.

description.english: Drag 10 allies to safety.
description.german: Ziehen Sie 10 Verbündete in Sicherheit.
description.french: Emmenez 10 alliés en lieu sûr.
description.italian: Trascina in salvo 10 alleati.
description.spanish: Arrastra a 10 aliados a cubierto.
description.schinese: 将10个队友拖到安全地点。
description.tchinese: 將10位盟友拖到安全處。
description.japanese: 味方を10回安全な場所まで運ぶ
description.arabic: Drag 10 allies to safety.
description.brazilian: Leve 10 aliados para segurança.

description.english: Get 6 groups of enemies to surrender.
description.german: Zwingen Sie 6 Gruppen von Feinden zur Aufgabe.
description.french: Obtenez la reddition de 6 groupes d'ennemis.
description.italian: Fai arrendere 6 gruppi di nemici.
description.spanish: Consigue que se rindan 6 grupos de enemigos.
description.schinese: 使6群敌人投降。
description.tchinese: 使6群敵人投降。
description.japanese: 敵集団を6回降伏させる
description.polish: Zmuś 6 grup wrogów do poddania się.
description.arabic: Get 6 groups of enemies to surrender.
description.brazilian: Faça 6 grupos de inimigos se renderem.

description.english: Save 8 allies locked in struggle.
description.german: Retten Sie 8 in Kämpfe verwickelte Verbündete.
description.french: Sauvez 8 alliés bloqués en combat.
description.italian: Salva 8 alleati impegnati in un combattimento.
description.spanish: Salva a 8 aliados en un aprieto.
description.schinese: 救助8名正与敌人肉搏的友军。
description.tchinese: 拯救8位正在掙扎的盟友。
description.japanese: 足止めを食らっている味方を8人助ける
description.polish: Ocal 8 sojuszników szarpiących się z wrogiem.
description.arabic: Save 8 allies locked in struggle.
description.brazilian: Salve 8 aliados presos em dificuldade.

description.english: Collect all 33 mementos.
description.german: Sammeln Sie alle 33 Erinnerungen.
description.french: Récupérez les 33 souvenirs.
description.italian: Ottieni tutti i 33 ricordi.
description.spanish: Consigue los 33 recuerdos.
description.schinese: 集齐全部33个纪念品。
description.tchinese: 收集全數33個紀念物。
description.japanese: 収集アイテムを33個全て集める
description.arabic: Collect all 33 mementos.
description.brazilian: Colete todos os 33 mementos.

description.english: Spend 3 minutes using Focus in the campaign.
description.german: Benutzen Sie in der Kampagne 3 Minuten lang Fokus.
description.french: Utilisez Concentration pendant 3 minutes dans la campagne.
description.italian: Nella Campagna, concentrati per 3 minuti.
description.spanish: Pasa 3 minutos usando Enfocar en la campaña.
description.schinese: 在战役中累计集中注意3分钟。
description.tchinese: 在劇情戰役中聚焦3分鐘。
description.russian: Использовать в кампании способность ''Сосредоточенность'' в течение 3 минут.
description.japanese: キャンペーンで照準の固定を3分間行う(遠距離武器)
description.polish: Łącznie przez 3 minuty używaj Skupienia w kampanii.
description.arabic: Spend 3 minutes using Focus in the campaign.
description.brazilian: Passe 3 minutos usando Foco na campanha.

description.english: Complete the game on Veteran difficulty.
description.german: Schließen Sie das Spiel auf dem Schwierigkeitsgrad Veteran ab.
description.french: Terminez le jeu en difficulté Vétéran.
description.italian: Completa il gioco a livello di difficoltà Veterano.
description.spanish: Completa la partida en dificultad veterano.
description.schinese: 以老兵难度通关。
description.tchinese: 在老手難度下完成遊戲。
description.japanese: 難易度ベテランでゲームをクリアする
description.polish: Ukończ grę na poziomie trudności Weteran.
description.arabic: Complete the game on Veteran difficulty.
description.brazilian: Complete o jogo na dificuldade Veterano.

description.english: Complete D-Day.
description.german: Schließen Sie 'D-Day' ab.
description.french: Terminez Jour J.
description.italian: Completa D-Day.
description.spanish: Completa Día D.
description.schinese: 完成“登陆日”。
description.tchinese: 完成「D日」。
description.japanese: 「D-デイ」をクリアする
description.arabic: Complete D-Day.
description.brazilian: Complete Dia D.

description.english: Breach the seawall in under two minutes without taking MG fire.
description.german: Durchbrechen Sie die Ufermauer in weniger als 2 Minuten, ohne von einem MG getroffen zu werden.
description.french: Ouvrez une brèche dans la digue en moins de 2 minutes sans être touché par les tirs de mitrailleuse.
description.italian: Apri un varco nella barriera marittima in meno di 2 minuti senza farti colpire dalla mitragliatrice.
description.koreana: 기관총 공격을 피해 2분 내로 방조제에 침투하십시오.
description.spanish: Atraviesa el rompeolas en menos de dos minutos sin recibir disparos de ametralladora.
description.schinese: 不被机枪击中，在2分钟内炸开海堤。
description.tchinese: 在2分鐘內攻破海堤且未被機槍擊中。
description.russian: Преодолеть укрепление менее чем за две минуты, не попав под пулеметный огонь.
description.japanese: 機関銃の攻撃を受けず、2分以内に護岸を突破する
description.polish: Unikając ognia KM-ów, dotrzyj do wału w mniej niż 2 minuty i wysadź go.
description.arabic: Breach the seawall in under two minutes without taking MG fire.
description.brazilian: Rompa o quebra-mar em menos de dois minutos sem levar fogo de metralhadora.

description.english: Complete Operation Cobra
description.german: Schließen Sie 'Operation Cobra' ab
description.french: Terminez Opération Cobra.
description.italian: Completa Operazione Cobra.
description.spanish: Completa Operación Cobra.
description.schinese: 完成“眼镜蛇行动”
description.tchinese: 完成「眼鏡蛇行動」
description.japanese: 「コブラ作戦」をクリアする
description.arabic: Complete Operation Cobra
description.brazilian: Complete a Operação "Cobra".

description.english: Protect your tanks by shooting down all planes in Operation Cobra.
description.german: Beschützen Sie Ihre Panzer in 'Operation Cobra', indem Sie alle Flugzeuge abschießen.
description.french: Protégez vos chars en abattant tous les avions dans Opération Cobra.
description.italian: In Operazione Cobra, proteggi i tuoi carri abbattendo tutti gli aerei.
description.koreana: 코브라 작전에서 모든 적기를 격추해 전차를 보호하십시오.
description.spanish: Protege tus tanques derribando todos los aviones en Operación Cobra.
description.schinese: 在眼镜蛇行动中保护友军坦克，击落全部敌机。
description.tchinese: 在「眼鏡蛇行動」中擊落所有飛機來保護你的坦克。
description.russian: Сбить все самолеты, угрожающие танкам, в операции ''Кобра''.
description.japanese: 「コブラ作戦」で全ての敵機を撃墜して戦車を守る
description.polish: Zestrzel wszystkie samoloty, chroniąc czołgi w misji Operacja Kobra.
description.arabic: Protect your tanks by shooting down all planes in Operation Cobra.
description.brazilian: Proteja seus tanques derrubando todos os aviões Operação Cobra.

description.english: Complete Stronghold.
description.german: Schließen Sie 'Die Festung' ab.
description.french: Terminez Bastion.
description.italian: Completa La Roccaforte.
description.spanish: Completa Fortaleza.
description.schinese: 完成“要塞”。
description.tchinese: 完成「大本營」。
description.japanese: 「要塞」をクリアする
description.arabic: Complete Stronghold.
description.brazilian: Complete Fortaleza.

description.english: Cover Zussman from the church without missing a shot in Stronghold.
description.german: Geben Sie Zussman in 'Die Festung' von der Kirche aus Deckung, ohne ein einziges Mal zu verfehlen.
description.french: Couvrez Zussman depuis l'église sans rater un tir dans Bastion.
description.italian: In La Roccaforte, copri Zussman dalla chiesa senza sbagliare un colpo.
description.spanish: Cubre a Zussman desde la iglesia sin fallar un tiro en Fortaleza.
description.schinese: 在“要塞”中，在从教堂掩护祖斯曼时弹无虚发。
description.tchinese: 在「大本營」中從教堂掩護扎斯曼且彈無虛發。
description.russian: Ни разу не промахнуться, прикрывая Цуссмана из церкви, в эпизоде ''Цитадель''.
description.japanese: 「要塞」で攻撃を一度も外さずに教会からザスマンを守る
description.polish: Nie spudłuj, osłaniając Zussmana z dzwonnicy kościoła w misji Twierdza.
description.arabic: Cover Zussman from the church without missing a shot in Stronghold.
description.brazilian: Proteja Zussman da igreja sem perder um tiro em Fortaleza.

description.english: Complete S.O.E.
description.german: Schließen Sie 'S.O.E.' ab.
description.french: Terminez S.O.E.
description.italian: Completa S.O.E.
description.spanish: Completa DOE.
description.schinese: 完成“特别行动处”。
description.tchinese: 完成「特別行動局」
description.japanese: 「特殊作戦執行部」をクリアする
description.arabic: Complete S.O.E.
description.brazilian: Complete O.E.E.

description.english: Complete the driving portion of S.O.E. without hitting any obstacles.
description.german: Schließen Sie den Fahrabschnitt in 'S.O.E.' ab, ohne eine Hindernis zu treffen.
description.french: Terminez la section en conduite de S.O.E. sans heurter d'obstacles.
description.italian: Completa la sezione di guida di S.O.E. senza urtare ostacoli.
description.koreana: 장애물에 부딪히지 않고 S.O.E.의 운전 파트를 완료하십시오.
description.spanish: Completa el segmento de conducción de DOE sin golpear ningún obstáculo.
description.schinese: 不撞到任何障碍物，完成“特别行动处”的驾驶部分。
description.tchinese: 完成「特別行動局」的駕駛部分，且沒有碰到任何障礙物。
description.russian: Завершить вождение в эпизоде ''УCO'', ни разу не столкнувшись с препятствиями.
description.japanese: 「特殊作戦執行部」の操縦パートを障害物に当たらずクリアする
description.polish: Ścigając pociąg w misji SOE, nie uderz w żadną przeszkodę.
description.arabic: Complete the driving portion of S.O.E. without hitting any obstacles.
description.brazilian: Complete a parte de dirigir em O.E.E. sem bater em nenhum obstáculo.

description.english: Complete Liberation
description.german: Schließen Sie 'Befreiung' ab
description.french: Terminez Libération.
description.italian: Completa Liberazione.
description.spanish: Completa Liberación.
description.schinese: 完成“解放”
description.tchinese: 完成「解放」
description.japanese: 「解放」をクリアする
description.arabic: Complete Liberation
description.brazilian: Complete "Liberação".

description.english: Sneak through the courtyard undetected in Liberation.
description.german: Schleichen Sie in 'Befreiung' unbemerkt über den Hof.
description.french: Faufilez-vous dans la cour sans vous faire détecter dans Libération.
description.italian: In Liberazione, passa furtivamente attraverso il cortile senza farti individuare.
description.koreana: 해방에서 적에게 들키지 않고 안뜰로 몰래 진입하십시오.
description.spanish: Atraviesa el patio sin que te detecten en Liberación.
description.schinese: 在“解放”中，不被发现穿过中庭。
description.tchinese: 在「解放」中偷偷溜過庭院且未被發現。
description.russian: Прокрасться через двор, не попавшись на глаза врагам, в эпизоде ''Освобождение''.
description.japanese: 「解放」で気付かれずに中庭を通り抜ける
description.polish: Niepostrzeżenie przekradnij się przez dziedziniec w misji Wyzwolenie.
description.arabic: Sneak through the courtyard undetected in Liberation.
description.brazilian: Esgueire-se pelo pátio sem ser detectado em Liberação.

description.english: Complete Collateral Damage.
description.german: Schließen Sie 'Kollateralschaden' ab.
description.french: Terminez Dommages collatéraux.
description.italian: Completa Danni collaterali.
description.spanish: Completa Daño colateral.
description.schinese: 完成“附带伤害”。
description.tchinese: 完成「間接傷害」。
description.japanese: 「巻き添え」をクリアする
description.arabic: Complete Collateral Damage.
description.brazilian: Complete Dano colateral.

description.english: Rescue your allies with the Sherman while keeping your armor above 80%.
description.german: Retten Sie Ihre Verbündeten mit dem Sherman bei mehr als 80% Rüstung.
description.french: Sauvez vos alliés avec le Sherman tout en gardant votre armure au-dessus de 80 %.
description.italian: Salva i tuoi alleati con lo Sherman mantenendo la tua corazza sopra all'80%.
description.koreana: 부수 피해에서 셔먼 전차로 장갑 80% 이상을 유지하면서 아군을 구출하십시오.
description.spanish: Rescata a tus aliados con el Sherman con tu blindaje por encima del 80%.
description.schinese: 在救援友军时保持谢尔曼的装甲不低于80%。
description.tchinese: 用一輛雪曼救助你的盟友，且護甲維持在80%以上。
description.russian: Спасти союзников с помощью "Шермана", сохранив более 80% брони
description.japanese: 装甲を80%以上に維持しながらシャーマンで味方を救出する
description.polish: Uratuj sojuszników, utrzymując stan pancerza Shermana powyżej 80%.
description.arabic: Rescue your allies with the Sherman while keeping your armor above 80%.
description.brazilian: Resgate seus aliados com Sherman mantendo a sua blindagem cima de 80%.

description.english: Complete Death Factory.
description.german: Schließen Sie die 'Todesfabrik' ab.
description.french: Terminez L'usine de la mort.
description.italian: Completa La fabbrica di morte.
description.spanish: Completa Carnicería.
description.schinese: 完成“死亡工厂”。
description.tchinese: 完成「死亡工廠」。
description.japanese: 「死の森」をクリアする
description.arabic: Complete Death Factory.
description.brazilian: Complete A fábrica da morte.

description.english: Sneak through the Dragon's Teeth undetected in Death Factory.
description.german: Schleichen Sie sich in der 'Todesfabrik' unbemerkt durch die Panzersperren.
description.french: Faufilez-vous entre les dents de dragon sans vous faire détecter dans L'Usine de la mort.
description.italian: In La fabbrica di morte, passa furtivamente attraverso i denti di drago senza farti individuare.
description.koreana: 죽음의 공장에서 적에게 들키지 않고 용치로 몰래 진입하십시오.
description.spanish: Escabúllete entre los dientes de dragón sin que te detecten en Carnicería.
description.schinese: 在“死亡工厂”中，不被发现潜伏穿过龙牙。
description.tchinese: 在「死亡工廠」中偷偷溜過龍牙且未被發現。
description.russian: Прокрасться через ''Зубы дракона'', не попавшись на глаза врагам, в эпизоде ''Фабрика смерти''.
description.japanese: 「死の森」で気付かれずにドラゴンの牙を通り抜ける
description.polish: Niepostrzeżenie przekradnij się przez zęby smoka w misji Fabryka Śmierci.
description.arabic: Sneak through the Dragon's Teeth undetected in Death Factory.
description.brazilian: Esgueire-se pelo dente do dragão sem ser detectado em Fábrica da morte.

description.english: Complete Hill 493.
description.german: Schließen Sie 'Hügel 493' ab.
description.french: Terminez Colline 493.
description.italian: Completa Colle 493.
description.spanish: Completa Colina 493.
description.schinese: 完成“493高地”。
description.tchinese: 完成「493高地」。
description.japanese: 「493高地」をクリアする
description.arabic: Complete Hill 493.
description.brazilian: Complete Colina 493.

description.english: Successfully escort the pole charge engineer to the pillbox in Hill 493.
description.german: Eskortieren Sie den Pionier mit der gestreckten Ladung zum Bunker auf 'Hügel 493'.
description.french: Escortez l'ingénieur de la charge télescopique jusqu'à la casemate dans Colline 493.
description.italian: In Colle 493, scorta il geniere con la carica allungata fino al fortino.
description.koreana: 493 고지에서 폭약 장대를 든 공병을 벙커까지 안전하게 호위하십시오.
description.spanish: Logra escoltar al ingeniero de la carga de poste hasta el fortín en Colina 493.
description.schinese: 在“493高地”中，成功护送携带炸药包的工兵到达碉堡。
description.tchinese: 在493高地成功保護長桿炸藥工程師抵達掩體。
description.russian: Проводить сапера с подрывным зарядом к бункеру в эпизоде ''Высота 493''.
description.japanese: 「493高地」でポールチャージの工兵をトーチカまで無事に護衛する
description.polish: W misji Wzgórze 493 doprowadź inżyniera z ładunkiem wybuchowym do bunkra.
description.arabic: Successfully escort the pole charge engineer to the pillbox in Hill 493.
description.brazilian: Acompanhe com sucesso o engenheiro de explosivo até a casamata em Colina 493.

description.english: Complete Battle of the Bulge.
description.german: Schließen Sie die 'Ardennenoffensive' ab.
description.french: Terminez Bataille des Ardennes.
description.italian: Completa Offensiva delle Ardenne.
description.spanish: Completa Batalla de las Ardenas.
description.schinese: 完成“突出部战役”。
description.tchinese: 完成「突出部之役」。
description.japanese: 「バルジの戦い」をクリアする
description.arabic: Complete Battle of the Bulge.
description.brazilian: Complete Batalha do Bulge.

description.english: Protect the bombers by personally shooting down 12 enemy planes.
description.german: Beschützen Sie die Bomber, indem Sie selbst 12 feindliche Flugzeuge abschießen.
description.french: Protégez les bombardiers en abattant personnellement 12 avions ennemis.
description.italian: Proteggi i bombardieri abbattendo personalmente 12 aerei nemici.
description.spanish: Protege a los bombarderos derribando tú mismo 12 aviones enemigos.
description.schinese: 在为轰炸机护航时独自击落12架敌机。
description.tchinese: 擊落12架敵軍戰機以保護轟炸機。
description.russian: Лично сбить 12 самолетов противника, защищая бомбардировщики.
description.japanese: 1人で敵機を12機撃墜して爆撃機を守る
description.arabic: Protect the bombers by personally shooting down 12 enemy planes.
description.brazilian: Proteja os bombardeiros derrubando pessoalmente 12 aviões inimigos.

description.english: Complete Ambush.
description.german: Schließen Sie 'Hinterhalt' ab.
description.french: Terminez Embuscade.
description.italian: Completa Imboscata.
description.spanish: Completa Emboscada.
description.schinese: 完成“伏击”。
description.tchinese: 完成「埋伏」。
description.japanese: 「待ち伏せ」をクリアする
description.arabic: Complete Ambush.
description.brazilian: Complete Emboscada.

description.english: Reach the sniper perch without being detected in Ambush.
description.german: Erreichen Sie in 'Hinterhalt' die Scharfschützenstellung, ohne entdeckt zu werden.
description.french: Atteignez le perchoir du tireur d'élite sans vous faire détecter dans Embuscade.
description.italian: In Imboscata, raggiungi la postazione del cecchino senza farti individuare.
description.koreana: 매복에서 발각되지 않고 저격수 위치에 도달하십시오.
description.spanish: Llega al puesto del francotirador sin que te detecten en Emboscada.
description.schinese: 在“伏击”中，不被发现抵达狙击位置。
description.tchinese: 在「埋伏」中抵達狙擊手藏身處且未被發現。
description.russian: Добраться до снайперского гнезда, не попадаясь на глаза врагам, в эпизоде ''Засада''.
description.japanese: 「待ち伏せ」で気付かれずに狙撃地点まで到達する
description.polish: Nie daj się wykryć w drodze na pozycję snajperską w misji Zasadzka.
description.arabic: Reach the sniper perch without being detected in Ambush.
description.brazilian: Alcance o parapeito do Franco-Atirador sem ser detectado em Emboscada.

displayName.french: À la vie, à la mort

description.english: Complete the campaign.
description.german: Schließen Sie die Kampagne ab.
description.french: Terminez la campagne.
description.italian: Completa la Campagna.
description.spanish: Completa la campaña.
description.schinese: 完成战役。
description.tchinese: 完成劇情戰役。
description.japanese: キャンペーンをクリアする
description.arabic: Complete the campaign.
description.brazilian: Complete a campanha.

description.english: Protect the convoy by shooting down all the planes in The Rhine.
description.german: Beschützen Sie in 'Der Rhein' den Konvoi, indem Sie alle Flugzeuge abschießen.
description.french: Protégez le convoi en abattant tous les avions pour les faire tomber dans le Rhin.
description.italian: In Il Reno, proteggi il convoglio abbattendo tutti gli aerei.
description.koreana: 라인강에서 모든 적기를 격추하여 호송대를 보호하십시오.
description.spanish: Protege al convoy abatiendo todos los aviones en El Rin.
description.schinese: 在“莱茵河”中，在保护车队时击落全部敌机。
description.tchinese: 擊落萊茵河上的所有飛機，以保護車隊。
description.russian: Сбить все самолеты, угрожающие колонне, в эпизоде ''Рейн''.
description.japanese: 「ライン川」で全ての敵機を撃墜して車列を守る
description.polish: Zestrzel wszystkie samoloty, chroniąc konwój w misji Ren.
description.arabic: Protect the convoy by shooting down all the planes in The Rhine.
description.brazilian: Proteja o comboio derrubando todos os aviões em O Reno.
